service.title: Oil Change Service
service.content: Oil changes are recommended every 5,000-7,500 miles for conventional oil and 7,500-10,000 miles for synthetic oil. Regular oil changes help maintain engine performance and longevity.

service.title: Routine Maintenance Schedule
service.content: Regular maintenance includes oil changes every 5,000-7,500 miles, tire rotations every 6,000-8,000 miles, brake inspections every 12,000 miles, and fluid checks at each service.

service.title: Check Engine Light Diagnostic
service.content: A check engine light can indicate various issues from loose gas cap to serious engine problems. We recommend a diagnostic scan to identify the specific error code and issue.

service.title: Tire Rotation and Balance
service.content: Tire rotation extends tire life and ensures even wear. We recommend rotation every 6,000-8,000 miles. Includes balance check and pressure adjustment.

service.title: Brake Inspection and Service
service.content: Brake service includes pad replacement, rotor inspection, fluid check, and system testing. Warning signs include squeaking, grinding, or reduced stopping power.

sales.title: Available Vehicle Models
sales.content: We offer a wide range of models including sedans (Camry, Accord), SUVs (RAV4, CR-V, Explorer), trucks (F-150, Silverado), and electric vehicles (Model 3, Leaf, Bolt).

sales.title: Financing Options
sales.content: We provide competitive financing with rates starting at 2.9% APR for qualified buyers. Flexible terms from 24-72 months. Trade-ins accepted.

sales.title: Schedule a Test Drive
sales.content: Test drives can be scheduled online or by calling our sales department. Available 7 days a week. Bring your driver's license and insurance information.

sales.title: Electric Vehicle Options
sales.content: Our EV lineup includes Tesla Model 3, Nissan Leaf, Chevy Bolt, and Ford Mustang Mach-E. Federal tax credits up to $7,500 available on select models.

sales.title: Vehicle Trade-In
sales.content: Get instant trade-in value online. We accept all makes and models. Trade-in value can be applied to your purchase or lease.

warranty.title: Standard Warranty Coverage
warranty.content: Our standard warranty covers 3 years/36,000 miles bumper-to-bumper and 5 years/60,000 miles powertrain. Includes roadside assistance and rental car coverage.

warranty.title: Extended Warranty Plans
warranty.content: Extended warranty options available for additional coverage beyond standard warranty. Plans range from 1-7 years with various mileage limits. Transferable to new owners.

warranty.title: Filing a Warranty Claim
warranty.content: To file a claim, contact our service department with your VIN and issue description. Most claims processed within 24-48 hours. Approved repairs covered 100%.

warranty.title: 24/7 Roadside Assistance
warranty.content: Included with warranty: towing, flat tire service, lockout assistance, fuel delivery, and jump starts. Available 24/7 nationwide.

technical.title: Vehicle Diagnostics
technical.content: Our certified technicians use advanced diagnostic tools to identify issues. Computer scan includes all vehicle systems: engine, transmission, ABS, airbags, and more.

technical.title: Vehicle Software Updates
technical.content: Software updates improve performance, add features, and fix bugs. Available OTA (over-the-air) for compatible vehicles or at service center. Updates typically take 30-60 minutes.

technical.title: Safety Recalls
technical.content: Check for open recalls using your VIN. All recall repairs are free regardless of warranty status. Schedule recall service online or by phone.

technical.title: Owner's Manual and Guides
technical.content: Digital owner's manuals available online. Includes maintenance schedules, feature guides, and troubleshooting. Also available as mobile app.

general.title: Service Hours
general.content: Service Department: Mon-Fri 7AM-7PM, Sat 8AM-5PM, Sun Closed. Sales Department: Mon-Sat 9AM-8PM, Sun 10AM-6PM.

general.title: Dealership Locations
general.content: Downtown Location: 123 Main St. North Location: 456 Oak Ave. South Location: 789 Elm Blvd. All locations offer full service and sales.

general.title: Contact Information
general.content: Service: 555-0100, Sales: 555-0200, Parts: 555-0300. Email: service@dealer.com. Live chat available on website 24/7.
